TestDescription.name: TimThumb WebShot remote code execution
TestDescription.Description: [coolbox][dark]The TimThumb script is exploitable only if the WebShot feature is enabled. By default, WebShot is disabled.[/dark][/coolbox][break] TimThumb is a small php script for cropping, zooming and resizing web images (jpg, png, gif). Many WordPress themes and plugins distribute this script. A remote code execution vulnerability was reported in the WebShot feature of this script. This vulnerability was reported in v2.8.13 but previous versions are also vulnerable.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can create, remove and modify any files on your server.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of timthumb or disable the WebShot feature (if enabled).

Reference.database: Wordpress TimThumb 2.8.13 WebShot Remote Code Execution (0-day)
